ygData.subject: Re: Couple of  questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... had a ... the Tesch ... I have ... reaping ... gnolls are ... someone ... good loot ... that gives a ... for myself ... There are several good areas to
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Jerry M. Banks" <y2kansas@k...> wrote:
> I just hit level 30 last night, and being the Druid that I am, I
had a
> couple of questions.
>
> First, I've been hunting in South Karana since level 25, hunting
the Tesch
> Mas Gnolls around Paw, and perhaps have become a little spoiled, as
I have
> been getting great experience killing the yellows and whites, and
reaping
> the rewards of the loot. Now, having reached level 30, all of the
gnolls are
> now nearing the point where hunting them isn't beneficial. Could
someone
> suggest a similar zone/area with good experience and average to
good loot
> where I could hunt fairly safely, either in a group or solo?
>
> Second, Could someone suggest an item for my arm, back, of legs
that gives a
> decent (around +3) Wisdom modifer that I could try to track down
for myself
> either through a quest or through hunting loot?
>
> Damasciss
> 30 Druid
> E'ci

There are several good areas to try. I've been to Dalnir in the
Warsliks Woods, the Mines of Nurga in the Frontier Mountains and Sol
A in Lavastorm. All of these are boosted experience areas, usually
+13%. So you get an extra boost. Groups are hit or miss as these
places are under-utilized since Velious. I went from 30 to 34 in the
Overthere in 3 days, and there's plenty of groups.

And if you're a permium member on Allakazam's site you can tailor a
seach for just +wis items for Druids. I find it's a great help. But
a Druid friend of mine says he really see's no point in upgrading
armor, since after 30 you're mainly a caster and kiter!

Good hunting
Tuldayen Grimblade
35th season Ranger of Tunare
